name: Ninja Forest
description:
Cyporkador's first game with the shitty title. Play this game to feel good about your own game since this game is so shit. Having that said, though, you're welcome to give feedback. Much appreciated :)

Controls:
- Up-arrow to jump
- Hold the up-arrow to glide
- Hold the down-arrow to slide
- Press the down-arrow while landing to fast-fall
- Tip: experiment with what you can and can't touch
